title: Notion Clone
description: A productivity app inspired by Notion, allowing users to create notes, to-do lists, and organize content online.

title: Linktree Clone
description: A clone of Linktree that lets users create a single landing page to organize and share multiple links.

title: AI Startup
description: A demo site for showcasing AI-driven business tools and services, demonstrating practical AI applications.

title: DesignLab
description: A platform to experiment with UI/UX designs, create prototypes, and test visual layouts interactively.

title: Country Showcase
description: A web app that lets users explore details of countries, including population, languages, and geography using REST API data.

title: Galleria Slideshow Site
description: A website that displays a series of images in an interactive slideshow format for galleries or portfolios.

title: Planet Factside
description: An educational site providing facts and information about planets in our solar system with an engaging interface
